sentence.Network_en: Our team leader isn't a petty skinflint, he's a Communist.
sentence.Network_cn: 咱组长不是小气鬼, 人家是共产党员.

sentence.Network_en: An old skinflint walked into a bakery.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个老吝啬鬼走了入面包店.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... flint 打火石，燧石 skinflint 吝啬鬼 imprint 盖印，刻印.
英语广播词汇（3）|无忧教育 ... skillful adj. 灵巧的，熟练的 skinflint n. 吝啬的人，小气鬼 slain slay 的过去分词.
善财 English, 翻译,... ... 善财难舍 miserly;skinflint 善财难舍 miserly;;skinflint 善恶 good and evil;good versus evil.
Swedis... ... gno = rub. merry 快乐，快乐，快活 glas = glass. skinflint 守财奴，小气鬼，吝啬鬼 gnista = spark. slip 滑翔，滑动.

entry.def: If you describe someone as a skinflint, you are saying that they are a mean person who hates spending money.

means.word_mean: 1. a selfish person who is unwilling to give or spend

auth_sentence.content: Seriously, Krugman claims Obama has been a skinflint because the potential GDP has been much higher than the actual GDP.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seriously, Krugman claims Obama has been a skinflint because the potential GDP has been much higher than the actual GDP.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seriously, Krugman claims Obama has been a skinflint because the potential GDP has been much higher than the actual GDP.

auth_sentence.content: Especially as everyone thinks you're a skinflint Have you ever tried to last a week without using cash?
auth_sentence.res_content: Especially as everyone thinks you're a skinflint Have you ever tried to last a week without using cash?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Especially as everyone thinks you're a skinflint Have you ever tried to last a week without using cash?

sentences.en: Except for skinflint sums ersons in the house occasionally rovide (a dime is considered very big money).
sentences.cn: 除去家里的人偶尔给的一点零钱（一角都算是大数目了）。
